text: Les copains du dimanche is a 1958 film which stars Jean Paul Belmondo. It was directed by Henri Aisner. The film promoted the trade union movement and was not seen in commercial cinemas. (in French) ==References== ==External links== * *Film page at Le Film Guide Category:1958 films Category:1958 comedy films Category:French films Category:French comedy films
title: Les Copains du dimanche
